short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate random numbers, yes/no answers & custom options from your list instantly!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
About extension:

Fortune Flipper new tab is a simple-to-use product that will enrich your browsing experience with a couple of features. The extension will update your new tab settings and will change your search to be powered by Microsoft Bing. 
Fortune Flipper new tab provides personalized new tab experience with added productivity features. Customize your new tab with a random background, clock, search box, and personalized greeting using your saved name. This extension offers three exciting options for randomization. Users can effortlessly generate a 'Yes' or 'No' outcome, obtain a random number within a specified range set by the user, or select a random value from a personalized list of inputted choices.

Useful Information:

By clicking "Add to chrome", you accept and agree to installing 'Fortune Flipper new tab', change New Tab to that provided by the service, New Tab searches to be powered by Microsoft Bing, the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
Just start by typing preferred search term (query) into the search box. The Fortune Flipper new tab search will provide Bing SERP with proper results.
To remove the Fortune Flipper new tab extension simply go to Google Chrome "Settings" page. Find the "Extensions" in the settings menu and there you will find Fortune Flipper new tab extension listed.
To uninstall it just use the "Remove" button.
Permissions Requested: "Replace the page you see when opening a new tab"

About us:

Fortune Flipper new tab team is dedicated to creating genuine products which will be useful for our users. We tend to provide GDPR aligned products, always prioritizing users' privacy. 
Considering that, we recognize that location-sharing is a concern for many people (ourselves included) and it is a responsibility we take very seriously. For more information on privacy and the security of your data visit our Privacy policy below.

To reach our support please write us to this email: contact@fortuneflipperext.com
